channel.title: Every time i kill something it gives me a dark bow
channel.description: Hey im using's Edge4pk and i changed up almost everything adding new items quests random events,But when i kill something anything it always gives me a dark bow witch i think is really stupid cause darkbows are like 1m in the rsps and i want to take it out help anyone please it would make my day!

item.title: Every time i kill something it gives me a dark bow

item.description:

tehjamdude:

Im not sure what Edge4pk is client and server wise but if it is 317 then there should be a cfg file called npc drops?

that but no when i kill something a guy chats and says heres a dark bow
